title: How to fix an HP printer on an offline Windows 7 error - Quora

response.answer_text: Fix HP printer offline issue on windows 7 Step 1: Check Connection Problems Step 2: Set Default Printer On your keyboard, click the Windows key, then choose Control Panel. In the Control Panel window, choose to Devices and Printer and set as Default Printer Step 3: Reset Printer Step 4: Update Printer Firmware Step 5: Update Printer Driver
